@description.name: @description
@description.body:
A multi-purpose widget, which combines a label with an icon. The intended purpose of qx.ui.mobile.basic.Atom is to easily align the common icon-text combination in different ways. Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 

   var atom = new qx.ui.mobile.basic.Atom("Icon Right", "icon/32/actions/go-next.png");
   this.getRoot().add(atom);

This example creates an atom with the label "Icon Right" and an icon.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: label {String} Label to use
@param.description: Label to use

@param.name: @param
@param.body: icon {String?null} Icon to use
@param.description: Icon to use

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The label/caption/text of the qx.ui.mobile.basic.Atom instance

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Any URI String supported by qx.ui.mobile.basic.Image to display an icon

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Configure the visibility of the sub elements/widgets. Possible values: both, text, icon

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The position of the icon in relation to the text. Only useful/needed if text and icon is configured and 'show' is configured as 'both' (default)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The owning object

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {String} The ID of the object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes care of lazily creating the layout and disposing an already present layout if necessary.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: verticalLayout {Boolean} Whether icon and label should be vertically aligned.
@param.description: Whether icon and label should be vertically aligned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hasNoLabel {Boolean} Whether the atom currently contains a label.
@param.description: Whether the atom currently contains a label.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the icon widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the label widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the icon widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: iconUrl {String} The icon url.
@param.description: The icon url.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the label widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: label {String} The text that should be displayed.
@param.description: The text that should be displayed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This function is responsible for creating and adding 2 children controls to the Button widget. A label and an icon.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: label {String} the text of the button
@param.description: the text of the button

@param.name: @param
@param.body: icon {String} A path to an image resource
@param.description: A path to an image resource

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message with translation hint Mark the messages for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param

@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message with translation hint Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Mark the message for translation but return the original message.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} the message ID
@param.description: the message ID
